title: Loadingscreen connecting problems
body:
Hi Riot developers,

Just now again the loading screen was buggy it didnt let me connect to the game...
It's not my E-net (cause I have 50MBits/s)
So I thought why dont you bring in the system of CS:GO at least for ranked matches like they did
If you cannot connect the game is just simply cancelled without anyone losing anything...
with that said this would only apply to cases like mine a few minutes ago that you can't connect
if you have already connected to the game and then lose connection there is already your remake feature...
but pls dont punish people who can't connect due to your own mistakes

And you guys know that this is an actual problem that sometimes people cant connect for various reasons like error in decoding
and furthermore if Im not mistaken Arena of Valor is a game developed by your company
so why dont you bring in the feature thats been sheduled in Arena of Valor already that people can see the estimated ping (ms) displayed in the launcher and get even warned if they try to enter a game with high-ping and cant even join the que if the ping is to high so high that it would be impossible to perform well...
thanks for taking your time

lilotchie
